Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Tree Daniels
Reviews.Content: Brought it from light in the box when it was $49.00 and both of my kids love it. They can't put it down. Not slow at all.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: latasha
Reviews.Content: I was satisfied with this part.  It works great and was easy to put on.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Unreponsive and slow to load
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Nice looking item, very compact and thin.  Screen is not bad for the price, however, I experienced great difficulty trying to make the touch screen respond.  It was also very slow to load sites even if you were close to the wifi source. At first I loved it but as I began to try to use it more, it became aggravating to me and made me want to buy something more costly but dependable. You get what you pay for. Not bad for the price if you are really really patient.

Reviews.Title: just got it and stil playing with it
Reviews.Author: new mom
Reviews.Content: It arrived fast! didn't realized it was coming from overseas. It picked up my wifi fine, it is kind of hard to enter log on info, still tryin to figure out that mechanism.

ProductInfo.Features:
7' 5-point capacitive touch screen
Built In Wifi
CPU： A13 up 1.5GHZ
512MHz DDR3 internal memory
ProductInfo.Name: Lightinthebox Starlight Blue - Android 4.0 Tablet with 7 Inch Multi-Touch Capacitive Screen (4GB,WiFi, 1.5GHz, 3G, Camera)
